attributes.action: Stirke a medal for Survivors & Relation aboard HM T Lancastria June 17th 1940
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scottish Parliament are to strike a medal for Scottish men women & Chidren aboard the Lancastria on 17th June 1940. This petition seek a medal for ALL personel aboard was is known as THE FORGOTTEN TRAGEDY.
Recognition has been given to other worthy causes The Land Army, Civillian Ferry Pilots & Bevan Boy's etc.
We consider Great Britain owes a debt of gratitude to all who survived or lost their lives and they deverve special recognition.
